name: Basic Sweet Dough
author: Ginny Robert
instructions: Scald milk and cool to lukewarm. Add yeast, 1 cup of sugar and 2 cups of flour. (This is your sponge.) Let rise 30 minutes. In large bowl sift in rest of flour, salt and sugar. With fingertips work butter into dry ingredients. Add egg yolk and sponge. Stir, then work with hands until quite thick. Knead dough on board, sprinkled with flour until smooth (you may have to add flour). Cover and let rise 1 to 1 1?2 hour. Punch down and knead again for a few minutes. Cover and let rise 30 minutes.
